headline: Qualcomm Tata Deal Puts India At Center Of Auto Chip Growth
summary: Qualcomm (NasdaqGS:QCOM) and Tata Electronics agreed to manufacture automotive modules in India. The partnership will use Tata Electronics' new OSAT facility in Assam for semiconductor assembly and testing. The project is described as India's first indigenous semiconductor assembly and testing facility focused on automotive modules. The collaboration is intended to support global demand for automotive electronics and strengthen local supply chains. For Qualcomm, which is known for wireless...
